name: EleDice Lords
description:
Short little thing for the GMTK 2022 Jam!

I started to go a little insane making this because of the summer heat so its very meh! Thanks for trying it tho!

How to play (The game is weird).

Click a tile to move to it.

You will deal damage to the enemy with the matching element.

Damage Equals all Dice with matching faces to the one you moved to in the same Row or Column. 

You have a limited time to act before the enemy skips your turn.

Ever x turns the enemys will attack every tile. SO KILL THEM FAST.

Code, Art, Design: Ilias Lays
Music: DarlingSaw

Sound: CC) Freesound.org
